name: Ghost Friends: Capstone Edition
description:
WASD - Move Lucy

Left Click - Advance Text Box (When clicking on the Blue Arrow), Choose Dialogue Choice.

Space - Interact with Switches (Also Advances Text, but this is buggy)

I - Open Inventory (Use your Mouse to interact with objects)

R - Reload and Start from the beginning

You are Lucy Andrews, and by god do you want to make friends.

You have your chance with a girl who wants your help with an artistic problem...but something strange happens along the way.
---

Another School Project from yours truly.
